name: Find Us!
description:
Important: I had to miss the deadline because I had some bugs as a result of poor testing and some issues building a WebGL build. D:

Instructions:

  • Collect coins while searching for these 4 creatures.  
  • Once the AI picks a food type, place some of that type of food in the level and it will go to one.  
  • Placing food costs a coin per item.
  • The AI and its light must be close by when you click upon us.
  • Try to find us all as quickly as you can!
